title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Introducing the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor, a modern and artistic addition to your home! These beautiful mirrors feature a unique design of circles within circles, adding a touch of novelty to your space. 

Each set includes 2 mirrors, allowing you to create a stunning display on your walls. The mirrors have a diameter of 15.7 inches with the frame and 10 inches without. The frame is made of durable iron, ensuring long-lasting quality. 

Hanging these mirrors is a breeze with the easy installation method of just a single screw. They weigh only 2 pounds, making them lightweight and easy to handle. The glass used is of high quality annealed glass, offering HD imaging and preventing warping and distortion. 

The frame color is a beautiful gold, with a finish that falls between matte and bright, adding a touch of elegance to any room. The versatility of these mirrors allows them to match various decoration styles, making them suitable for your living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, or office space. 

Not only can these mirrors be styled independently, but they also offer combination options with other wall art such as paintings, wall sculptures, and candle sconces. The possibilities are endless! 

Rest assured, these mirrors are packaged with care to ensure safe delivery. They are the perfect decoration for your home, adding a touch of sophistication and style. Upgrade your space with the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor today!
